content.text: I'll use the nx_workspace MCP tool to find out how many projects are in this workspace.

input.prompt: Use the nx_workspace mcp tool to determine how many projects are in this Nx workspace. I need to get a count of all projects configured in the workspace.

content.text: I'll use the nx_workspace mcp tool to determine how many projects are configured in this Nx workspace.
Let me try a different approach to get the project count. I'll use the Nx CLI to list all projects:
